title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-community/llms/ollama
summary: LangChain integration letting you swap in any Ollama model as an LLM or chat backend.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; folders, personas, RAG, multimodal.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, history, and completion for Ollama.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a local GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama supporting Kotlin, Scala, and Android via OkHttp.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with idiomatic Ruby objects.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with PDFs.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that spins up threads per user and streams Ollama answers with slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI pipelines that caches model pulls and runs Ollama tests in containers.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server exposing Ollama functions to Claude Desktop and other MCP clients.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake packaging Ollama binaries and a NixOS module for declarative model management.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.x integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator components.

title: ollama-cdktf
summary: CDKTF (Terraform) construct library to deploy Ollama on AWS ECS with GPU support.

title: ollama-camel
summary: CAMEL-AI framework backend enabling multi-agent simulations powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama-litellm
summary: LiteLLM proxy letting you call Ollama via OpenAI-compatible endpoints for unified billing/logging.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama with generated structs from the OpenAPI spec.
